summary.span: 提供一组标准的与编辑相关的命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of editing related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了编辑命令和关联的默认键笔势 (使用从键名称和枚举)。The following table shows the editing commands and the associated default key gestures (with key names from the and enumerations). |编辑命令Editing command|默认键笔势Default key gesture| |---------------------|-------------------------| ||`Ctrl`+`E`| ||`Ctrl`+`J`| ||`Ctrl`+`L`| ||`Ctrl`+`R`| ||`Backspace`| ||无默认键笔势no default key gesture| ||`Ctrl`+`OemOpenBrackets`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`T`| ||`Delete`| ||`Ctrl`+`Delete`| ||`Ctrl`+`Backspace`| ||`Shift`+`Enter`| ||`Enter`| ||无默认键笔势no default key gesture| ||`Ctrl`+`OemCloseBrackets`| ||`Ctrl`+`T`| ||`Down`| ||`PageDown`| ||`Ctrl`+`Down`| ||`Left`| ||`Ctrl`+`Left`| ||`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`End`| ||`Ctrl`+`Home`| ||`End`| ||`Home`| ||`Up`| ||`PageUp`| ||`Ctrl`+`Up`| ||`Shift`+`Down`| ||`Shift`+`PageDown`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Down`| ||`Shift`+`Left`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Left`| ||`Shift`+`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`End`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Home`| ||`Shift`+`End`| ||`Shift`+`Home`| ||`Shift`+`Up`| ||`Shift`+`PageUp`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Up`| ||`Shift`+`Tab`| ||`Tab`| ||`Ctrl`+`B`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`L`| ||`Insert`| ||`Ctrl`+`I`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`N`| ||`Ctrl`+`OemPlus`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift+OemPlus`| ||`Ctrl`+`U`| 插入符号移动命令和选择扩展命令共享一组公共的默认键笔势，常规的区别在于添加键来选择命令区分从插入符号移动命令。Caret movement commands and selection expanding commands share a common set of default key gestures, the general difference being the addition of the key to differentiate selection commands from caret movement commands. 例如，命令包含的默认键笔势，和相应命令具有的默认键笔势 + 。For example, the command has a default key gesture of , and the corresponding command has a default key gesture of +. 一般情况下，命令定义由类不能使用的命令参数 (`parameter`参数所需的方法)。In general, the command definitions provided by the class do not make use of command parameters (the `parameter` parameter expected by the method). 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用上支持该命令的对象的编辑命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 此示例中，为用作命令目标。For this example, a serves as the command target. 请注意，实现接口 (继承自)，并且必须包含对多个编辑命令的本机支持。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 第一个参数方法是一个命令参数。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 最编辑命令忽略的命令参数;一般情况下，此参数应为`null`编辑命令。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二个参数指定该命令将路由到的对象。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 此对象必须实现接口，并应包含指定的命令的处理程序。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 通常情况下，在不处理该命令的对象上调用时，已忽略命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. [!code-csharp[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_editingcommands_invoke)] [!code-vb[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_editingcommands_invoke)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AlignCenter As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ AlignCenter { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示 命令，该命令请求将当前段落或选中的段落居中。

span.span: Represents the command, which requests that the current paragraph or a selection of paragraphs be centered.
The requested command.
The default key gesture for this command is +.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令在级别。This command operates at the level. 如果针对部分选择的内容 （包括空选择，其中将插入符号是在段落中） 对段落中调用此命令，请求的效果应用于整个段落。If this command is invoked on a partial selection of content within a paragraph (including an empty selection where the caret is within a paragraph), the requested effect is applied to the entire paragraph. 如果跨越多个段落所选内容上调用此命令，该效果被应用于出现在所选内容中，每个段落的所有内容。If this command is invoked on a selection that spans multiple paragraphs, the effect is applied to the entire contents of each paragraph that participates in the selection. 下图显示了居中内容的示例。The following figure shows an example of centered content. ![屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值 Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值 Center")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center") 此命令本身就支持。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AlignJustify As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ AlignJustify { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示 命令，该命令请求将当前段落或选中的段落两端对齐。

span.span: Represents the command, which requests that the current paragraph or a selection of paragraphs be justified.
The requested command.
The default key gesture for this command is +.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令在级别。This command operates at the level. 如果针对部分选择的内容 （包括空选择，其中将插入符号是在段落中） 对段落中调用此命令，请求的效果应用于整个段落。If this command is invoked on a partial selection of content within a paragraph (including an empty selection where the caret is within a paragraph), the requested effect is applied to the entire paragraph. 如果跨越多个段落所选内容上调用此命令，该效果被应用到所选内容中的所有段落。If this command is invoked on a selection that spans multiple paragraphs, the effect is applied to all the paragraphs in the selection. 对齐内容中各行内容, 的水平间距被调整以便对齐的线是等同于或近似相等宽度。When content is justified, the horizontal spacing within each line of content is adjusted so that the justified lines are of equal or near-equal width. 内容通常各边的内容创建平滑边缘的对齐。Content is typically justified to create smooth edges on the sides of the content. 因为它通常是短于其余部分，一个段落中的最后一行后调用此命令可能会保持对齐。Because it is often shorter than the rest, the last line in a paragraph may remain unjustified after this command is invoked. 下图显示了对齐 （左对齐） 内容。The following figure shows unjustified (left-aligned) content. ![屏幕快照： 内容未对齐](~/add/media/content-unjustified.png "屏幕快照： 内容未对齐")![Screenshot: Content is unjustified](~/add/media/content-unjustified.png "Screenshot: Content is unjustified") 下图显示相同的内容后两端对齐。The following figure shows the same content after it has been justified. ![内容的屏幕截图对齐的文本](~/add/media/content-justified.png "内容的屏幕截图对齐的文本")![Screenshot of content justified text](~/add/media/content-justified.png "Screenshot of content justified text") 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 此命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下响应的命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 此命令本身就支持。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

value.span: 此命令的默认键笔势为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用对空选择时，此命令将删除之前将插入符号的字符或段落分隔符。When invoked on an empty selection, this command deletes the character or paragraph separator just before the caret. 调用对非空选择时，此命令将删除所选内容。When invoked on a non-empty selection, this command deletes the selection. 此命令将保留任何格式设置为调用此命令后立即插入相同的位置的内容已删除所选内容。This command retains any formatting from the deleted selection for content immediately inserted at the same location after this command is invoked. 与之相反命令，不会保留以前的格式设置。Contrast with the command, which does not retain previous formatting. 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 此命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下响应的命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 此命令以本机方式受， ，和。This command is natively supported by , , and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
